name: City Taxi Duty Driver Sim
description:
City Taxi Duty Driver Sim will give you hours of game play, full of traffic racer action, different missions and more! Test your patience, technical exciting levels, but will not accidentally open too fast crash! in this newest big city adventure and taxi driver 3D simulator, your taxi driver duty starts today. Take a seat behind the steering wheel in this 3d taxi driver game, drive around in different taxis, and earn cash.
Features:
Engaging Taxi Driver sim Missions
Enjoy realistic simulation and animation!
Smooth car controls and addictive gameplay
Race the Taxi through a real city environment
Animated passengers unseen in usual taxi simulator games
